# ParticleEmitterComponent.EmitterShape.cone

**Case**

Particles emit from a cone with its apex pointing up along the y-axis, centered on the origin.

## Declaration

```swift
case cone
```
title: ParticleEmitterComponent.EmitterShape.cone
